title: Showing wrong rank in the pesu site what to do?
content:
My rank is 81k 94.56 percentile 
But here it's showing 170k ??

I remember so clearly I put in the right rank even double checked 

Office will be closed tomorrow and I'm trying to email them now

comments.body: Is 81k ur category rank or general rank?
As ur %ile is 94 then it should be general but i am conforming
Yes it's the CRL I got 94.56 in mains I'm general
Does the qr code on ur result card clearly visible?
Does ur pes rank is 2800+
It should be I posted it directly from the jee site I used in other counselling too

Yes it's in 3k

It should be around 1.5k
What are the chances that I get cse or aiml at2100 rank ??
When was the last time (date) u filled rank and submit pdf as i had filled 2-3 times rank and submit pdf then my rank given is correct
Maybe some coding problem of website for 94.56 number i guess
I m also in line, i dont know will we get or not

I filled the form on 21st I guess It was the last date too but I'm so sure I filled it correctly don't they recheck with the pdf they ask for jee 

This is so messed up ðŸ˜­ðŸ˜­
What was the cut off last year??
Maybe or maybe that we both filled the form on 21st I don't know they should rectify this and give new rankings
Call to the office tommorrow in every 20 minutes after office opening as they hardly attend calls (from experience)
Until last year they dont take direct admission from jee mains through online website as per i know
Um also was this list solely on this month's basis or mixed with yhthe list of early allotment and jee mains January counselling
I dont know man why private college do not make process more transparent

https://preview.redd.it/hczczqjj2k2f1.jpeg?width=1280&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=96936bcb72bfaa2eef6ed8a59fc9e28498619064

This is what they are showing this but it's for the one who hasn't uploaded their rank card do u think they'll let me edit it??

Also mailing them right now.
How would we know that we have to report or not???
They re gonna give a further instructions message apparently
